Pengacara Apresiasi MA Kurangi Hukuman M Sanusi di Kasus Reklamasi
01 Nov 2019, 19:09 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Tim pengacara mengapresiasi putusan Mahkamah Agung (MA) yang mengabulkan permohonan peninjauan kembali (PK) eks anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta Mohamad Sanusi. Hukuman Sanusi dikurangi dari 10 tahun penjara menjadi 7 tahun penjara dalam perkara korupsi perizinan reklamasi Pantai Jakarta.
"Kami selaku tim kuasa hukum M Sanusi sangat mengapresiasi putusan peninjauan kembali klien kami. Untuk kami, putusan tersebut kami rasa cukup memenuhi frasa keadilan," kata pengacara Sanusi, Adhitya A Nasution, kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
"Walaupun kami belum menerima salinan resminya dari MA, dengan hasil yang telah diumumkan tersebut, kami mengucapkan apresiasi yang setinggi-tingginya terhadap MA karena masih mampu memberikan rasa keadilan bagi para pencari keadilan," sambung dia.
Di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, M Sanusi dinyatakan terbukti menerima suap Rp 2 miliar dari bos Agung Podomoro Land, Ariesman Widjaja. Uang tersebut terkait dengan pembahasan Raperda Rencana Tata Ruang Kawasan Strategis Pantai Utara (RTRKSP) Jakarta di Balegda DPRD DKI. Sanusi divonis 7 tahun penjara di pengadilan tingkat pertama ini.
Jaksa kemudian mengajukan banding. Hukuman Sanusi diperberat menjadi 10 tahun penjara. Putusan ini diperkuat putusan kasasi.
Di tingkat peninjauan kembali (PK), Sanusi dikurangi hukumannya menjadi 7 tahun penjara.

MA Appreciation Attorney Reduces Sentencing of M Sanusi in Reclamation Case
Nov 1 2019, 19:09 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The team of lawyers appreciated the decision of the Supreme Court (MA) which granted the request for a review (PK) of former DKI Jakarta DPRD member Mohamad Sanusi. Sanusi's sentence was reduced from 10 years in prison to 7 years in a corruption case in the Jakarta Beach reclamation permit.
"We as the legal team of M Sanusi really appreciate the decision of our client's review. For us, the decision we feel is sufficient to meet the phrase justice," said Sanusi's lawyer, Adhitya A Nasution, told reporters on Friday (1/11/2019).
"Although we have not yet received an official copy from the Supreme Court, with the announced results, we express our highest appreciation for the Supreme Court for being able to provide a sense of justice for justice seekers," he continued.
In the Jakarta Corruption Court, M Sanusi was found guilty of receiving a bribe of Rp 2 billion from Agung Podomoro Land's boss, Ariesman Widjaja. The money is related to the discussion of the Draft Regional Regulation on Spatial Planning for the North Coast Strategic Area (RTRKSP) of Jakarta at the DKI DPRD Regional Legislative Body. Sanusi was sentenced to 7 years in prison in this first instance court.
The prosecutor then appealed. Sanusi's sentence was increased to 10 years in prison. This decision was strengthened by the cassation decision.
At the review level (PK), Sanusi was reduced to 7 years in prison.
